Item ID39

Bronze arrowtips are made with a bronze bar requiring 5 Smithing, yielding 12.5 Smithing experience and 15 bronze arrowtips. They are made into bronze arrows when used with headless arrows, requiring 1 Fletching, yielding 19.5 Fletching experience per 15 arrows.

They are purchased for 1 coin at the ranging shops: Hickton's Archery Emporium in Catherby, Armoury in the Combat Training Camp, Dargaud's Bow and Arrows in the Ranging Guild, Gulluck and Sons on the 2nd floor[UK]3rd floor[US] of the Grand Tree, and Void Knight Archery Store at the Void Knights' Outpost.

[[File:Bronze arrowtips detail.png|left|130x200px]]
'''Bronze arrowtips''' are made with a [[bronze bar]] requiring 5 [[Smithing]], yielding 12.5 Smithing [[experience]] and 15 bronze arrowtips. They are made into [[bronze arrow]]s when used with [[headless arrow]]s, requiring 1 [[Fletching]], yielding 19.5 Fletching experience per 15 arrows. 

They are purchased for {{NoCoins|1}} coin at the ranging shops: [[Hickton's Archery Emporium]] in [[Catherby]], [[Armoury]] in the [[Combat Training Camp]], [[Dargaud's Bow and Arrows]] in the [[Ranging Guild]], [[Gulluck and Sons]] on the {{FloorNumber|uk=2}} of the [[Grand Tree]], and [[Void Knight Archery Store]] at the [[Void Knights' Outpost]].
